author: schone_wizard
content:
Given the changes introduced in `get_attesting_indices` is there any shorthand to calculate the particular bit index of a given validator index in aggregation_bits without going committee by committee and figuring out its length? 

I am trying to answer the direct question of  did validator with index X attest in this aggregation_bits string.
